data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for To Consider And Approve The Un-Audited Standalone Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter Ended December 31 2025
data.news_body: Glottis Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 13/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve The Un-audited Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended December 31 2025

data.descriptor: Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.news_body: The Compliance Certificate under 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018 is enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Opening Of New Branch - Intimation Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.
data.news_body: This is hereby informed that the company has opened a new branch office in Ahmedabad Gujarat with effect from 02nd January 2026.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: It is hereby intimated that the trading window of the Company shall be closed with effect from January 01 2026 in connection with the consideration and declaration of unaudited standalone financial results for the quarter ended on December 31 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: we wish to inform you that Glottis Limited (Glottis or the Company) will interact with the Investors / Brokers on Wednesday December 10 2025 in Group / One on One basis as a part of a Non-Deal Roadshow through physical mode.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: We wish to inform that the Company has scheduled a group meet with Investors on Friday December 5 2025 through virtual mode.

data.caption: Regulation 30 Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulations 2015)
data.news_body: Announcement under Regulation 30 of SEBI LODR 2015 regarding the Order received from the Commissioner of GST & Central Excise (Appeals 1) Chennai.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting - Submission Of Un-Audited Financial Results Along With Limited Review Report In Terms Of Regulation 30 And 33(3)(J) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.
data.news_body:
With reference to the above-cited subject we wish to inform that the Board of Directors at its meeting held today i.e. October 27 2025 has inter-alia considered and approved the Un-Audited Financial Results for the 1st quarter ended June 30 2025 pursuant to regulation 33(3)(j) of Listing Regulations.
The Un-Audited Financial Results for the 1st quarter ended June 30 2025 along with the Limited Review Report issued by the Statutory Auditors of the Company is enclosed herewith.

data.news_body:
With reference to the above-cited subject we wish to inform that the Board of Directors at its meeting held today i.e. October 27 2025 has inter-alia considered and approved the Un-Audited Financial Results for the 1st quarter ended June 30 2025 pursuant to regulation 33(3)(j) of Listing Regulations.
The Un-Audited Financial Results for the 1st quarter ended June 30 2025 along with the Limited Review Report issued by the Statutory Auditors of the Company is enclosed herewith.

data.news_body: Glottis Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 27/10/2025 inter alia to consider and approve With reference to the above cited subject we wish to inform that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Monday October 27 2025 inter alia to consider and approve the Un-audited Standalone Financial Result of the Company for the 1st quarter ended on June 30 2025 in line with the Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 8(2) Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Prohibition Of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015
data.news_body: Intimation Under Regulation 8(2) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations. 2015

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
In terms of the SEBI Prohibition of Insider Trading Regulations 2015 the trading window for investing in shares shall be closed for the designated person and immediate relatives with effect from September 07 2025 in connection with the Unaudited Standalone Financial Statement for the June 2025 and September 2025 quarters. 

And the window shall be closed till 48 hrs from closure of the declaration of September 2025 results.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Glottis Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from October 07 2025 the equity shares of Glottis Ltd(Scrip Code: 544557) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251006-55 dated October 06 2025.
